content: 26 november 2012 i have just uploaded an expanded version as a full sock pattern dither2 pdf i am leaving the original live for the moment as it is still very easily adaptable for other garments you should have knit stranded socks before as this will give you an idea of how many stitches you will need to cast on and how many row you will need for the foot if you have any problems adapting the chart please feel free to send me a message
